archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.3.8b: b) deploying a variety of detection methods, such as anomaly detection techniques (supported by machine learning), detection technology (e.g. honeypots or honeynets), endpoint detection and response (EDR), purple teaming, and user and entity behavioural analytics (UEBA))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
